summary: MindsDB installation fails due to missing dependency on Ubuntu 22.04
creator: alice.johnson
description: User reports installation failure on Ubuntu 22.04 due to missing system dependencies such as libpq-dev and python3-dev. Needs update to installation guide.

summary: Error connecting MindsDB to PostgreSQL: “Connection refused (port 47334)”
creator: rahul.nair
description: Connection to PostgreSQL from MindsDB fails due to firewall restriction or incorrect port configuration. Suggested fix: verify PostgreSQL settings and MindsDB configuration.yaml.

summary: Docker container for MindsDB exits immediately after startup
creator: maria.lopez
description: Docker logs show segmentation fault when loading entrypoint.sh. Issue fixed after correcting the environment variable syntax in docker-compose file.

summary: MindsDB service not reachable on localhost after installation
creator: samir.patel
description: After completing setup, service not accessible on port 47334. Possible root cause: proxy settings or incorrect bind address in configuration.

summary: SSL certificate validation error while starting MindsDB with HTTPS enabled
creator: lucas.smith
description: When enabling HTTPS mode, MindsDB throws SSL error: certificate verify failed. Issue likely due to expired self-signed certificate.

summary: MindsDB fails to load configuration from .env file
creator: tina.fernandez
description: .env variables not being recognized at startup. Possible issue with working directory path or dotenv library version.

summary: Incompatible Python version error during MindsDB CLI setup
creator: chris.wong
description: CLI installation fails with Python 3.12. Updated dependency version to support latest Python release.

summary: Cannot connect MindsDB to MySQL database: “Handshake Error”
creator: sophie.khan
description: MySQL authentication fails during connection test. Likely caused by incompatible MySQL connector version.

summary: Snowflake integration with MindsDB keeps timing out
creator: david.jones
description: Connection to Snowflake warehouse takes too long, leading to timeout. Investigating network latency or wrong region endpoint configuration.

summary: MindsDB not detecting schema changes in connected database
creator: nina.roberts
description: Schema refresh not triggered automatically after altering database structure. Manual resync works as expected.

summary: Error when querying external table through MindsDB: “Table does not exist”
creator: andrew.martin
description: MindsDB throws 'table not found' when querying newly linked database. Issue fixed after adjusting table naming convention.

summary: MindsDB connection to ClickHouse fails with authentication error
creator: laura.singh
description: Unable to authenticate to ClickHouse. Connection works externally but fails from MindsDB container.

summary: AutoML model training stuck at “preprocessing” stage
creator: rohit.mehra
description: Training job never progresses past preprocessing stage. Potential memory constraint or dataset parsing issue.

summary: Model deployment error: “Invalid target column specified”
creator: emma.jacobs
description: Deployment fails because the model target column doesn't exist in the training dataset. Error handled and documentation updated.

summary: Predictions returning null values for valid inputs
creator: peter.huang
description: Several prediction requests return null. Investigating data normalization and feature encoding issues.

summary: MindsDB fails to detect correct data types during model creation
creator: karla.torres
description: Columns with integer strings are being cast to categorical instead of numeric. Requires improved schema inference.

summary: Unexpected drop in model accuracy after retraining on new dataset
creator: henry.bose
description: Model retrained with latest dataset shows 25% accuracy drop. Investigating data drift or improper label encoding.

summary: MindsDB API returning HTTP 500 on /predict endpoint
creator: olivia.brown
description: Requests to /predict endpoint intermittently fail with 500. Logs show internal serialization error.

summary: MindsDB Studio UI not loading datasets after refresh
creator: yusuf.khan
description: UI dataset list empties out after refresh. Likely frontend caching or API response parsing issue.

summary: Error integrating MindsDB REST API with external Flask app
creator: george.mathew
description: Flask app fails to parse MindsDB JSON response. Added JSON serialization fix and retry logic.
